Text: Nov Membership Conference Call Cc Subject Nov Membership Conference Call MAIN Members Attached is a draft version of MAINs Contractual Compliance and Enforcement AgreementMAIN Agreement plus Exhibit known as MAINs Plan B These documents are for member review and commentary Written comments are due back to MAIN Compliance by October This will be followed by a MAIN Member conference call covering the Plan B comments on November at AM CST The tentative plan is to get member approval of this MAIN Agreement at the Annual Meeting on November This will permit MAINs Chairman to sign the NERCRegional Agreement MAINs Plan B enactment is contingent on of MAINs Control Area Members signing the Agreement Please review the attached letter from Peter Steitz Compliance Enforcement Task Force Chairman which outlines the MAIN Plan B Program Norb Mizwicki MAIN Compliance Director MAINNERC Memdoc MAIN Program doc MAIN PlanBdoc MAIN Exhibit doc MAIN Exhibit doc
